document_data.name: Fair Venture
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Fair Venture''''' was a [[caravel]] that operated in the water around [[Sembia]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned by the merchant [[Golthond]] of [[Thesk]].
document_data.History: In [[Flamerule]] of [[1357 DR]], after leaving port in [[Sembia]] the ''Fair Venture'' went missing while passing by the [[Pirate Isles]]. In response, Golthond sought to hire a group of mercenaries to clear the islands of the raiding sea-bandits.
